author: Fox News
title: Ukraine war: Elderly couple stands ground with Russian soldiers, earning praise from US Embassy
description: An unarmed, “elderly” Ukrainian couple who stood up to a group of Russian soldiers on their property is gaining international praise after video of the encounter went viral.
content:
